title: Micro-Interaction Library
description: Collection of reusable micro-interactions for Flutter apps.
motivation: Small animations like button presses, loading states, and success feedback make apps feel polished. I collected my best micro-interactions into a reusable library.

approach.description: Curated and refined micro-interactions from production apps into a cohesive, themeable library.

steps.title: Collection
steps.description: Gathered micro-interactions from my projects and analyzed popular apps for inspiration.

steps.title: Standardization
steps.description: Created consistent API patterns and theming support across all components.

steps.title: Performance Audit
steps.description: Optimized all animations for 60fps on low-end devices.

steps.title: Documentation
steps.description: Built interactive documentation with live examples and copy-paste code.

worked: Consistent easing curves create cohesive feel
Theme-able colors and durations increase adoption
Live examples in docs reduce friction
didntWork: Some animations conflicted with parent widgets

keyInsights.title: Delight is in Details
keyInsights.description: Users notice when apps feel 'premium' even if they can't explain why.

keyInsights.title: Accessibility First
keyInsights.description: All animations respect reduce-motion settings for inclusive design.

keyInsights.title: Open Source Hygiene
keyInsights.description: Good README, examples, and changelogs are as important as code.

futurePlans:
Growing the library with:

• More component types (loaders, reveals, morphs)
• Figma design tokens sync
• Per-component performance benchmarks
• Community contribution guidelines
